thread.title: UAE welcomes UNSC resolution calling for ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan | World News - Business Standard
thread.title_full: UAE welcomes UNSC resolution calling for ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan | World News - Business Standard

author: Business Standard
title: UAE welcomes UNSC resolution calling for ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan | World News - Business Standard
text:
The UAE has welcomed the UN Security Council resolution which calls for a ceasefire in Sudan during Ramadan, in light of the continued deterioration of the humanitarian situation. In a statement, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MoFA) expressed hope that this step would lead towards ending the crisis between the Sudanese parties, preventing further suffering of the Sudanese people, and facilitating the arrival of relief and humanitarian aid to the affected areas, especially for the most vulnerable groups, including the sick, children, the elderly and women. Click here to follow our WhatsApp channel The Ministry underscored its steadfast support for all endeavours working towards de-escalation, achieving a ceasefire, and initiating political dialogue, that facilitates the restoration of peace, safety and security and fulfils the aspirations of the brotherly Sudanese people for stability and prosperity. (Only the headline and picture of this report may have been reworked by the Business Standard staff; the rest of the content is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)
